column2: and most of the food was warm by the time we got home. (The fry bag was open so our taters got a bit chilled). That being said
column4: the brisket I am told was tender and delicious. The mac was good and the beans were delicious... though strict veggies beware a meat chunk did live in the beans. I also indulged in some corn bread which had corn in it and was not your typical dry cornbread. And I'm not big on slaw
column5: but the fiance really dug that it wasn't made with mayo.
